thread.title: Emerald Princess ship gas cylinder explodes and kills man
thread.title_full: Emerald Princess ship gas cylinder explodes and kills man | Daily Mail Online

author: Cindy Tran for Daily Mail Australia
title: Emerald Princess ship gas cylinder explodes and kills man
text:
A man has been killed after a gas explosion on board the Emerald Princess cruise ship that was docked in New Zealand .
The man, a crew member of the ship, died at the scene after a gas cylinder detonated at the rear of the vessel.
The inflatable vessels were being reinflated by the deck when the gas bottle flew off the ship following the explosion around 5pm on Thursday, NZ Herald reported.
The ship was on a 12-night round trip cruise from Sydney to destinations around New Zealand, Otago Daily Times reported.
Otago Coastal area commander Inspector Jason Guthrie said no one else was reported injured in the incident.
A person has been killed after a gas explosion on board the Emerald Princess cruise ship docked in New Zealand
Australian passenger Krystal Friggieri said she saw the gas cylinder 'spinning on the wharf' after hearing a loud explosion.
Spokesperson David Jones for Carnival Australia, which operates the cruise ship, said the crew member tragically died in the explosion.
'First reports indicate that the incident happened during some technical work on the hydraulic launching system on a tender vessel,' he said.
'We are deeply saddened that a member of Emerald Princess' crew was fatally injured in the incident.'
Maritime Union Port Chalmers-Dunedin secretary Phil Adams, who was working in the port's control room, heard a 'massive explosion'.
'[I] got up and I saw this pipe or a tube lying on the wharf ... it was a gas cylinder, by the sounds of things, that had just blown straight off the ship and on to the wharf,' he told Otago Daily Times.
'Man, I've never heard an explosion like it in my bloody life. I'd say most of Port [Chalmers] felt it.'
An investigation is underway as it is not yet known when the cruise will depart.
A person has reportedly died after a gas explosion aboard the Emerald Princess cruise ship docked in New Zealand (file image)
